content: around the base of the ponytail passing it under the ponytail twisting it and tighten it up the small heart is done in the following way prepare a magic_ring but don t tighten it up work in the ring half_double_crochet single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet half_double_crochet chain 1 sl in the magic_ring then tighten up the magic_ring 18 crochet pattern by chiara cremon @chiacrafts ​ https //www instagram com/chiacrafts https //www ravelry com/stores/chiara-cremon-designs congratulations your vanellope is ready don t forget to send me a picture and tag me / give me credits / use my hashtag when posting online all info is in the licence 19
